first_translate: fiona...?
apparently,
abel has gone missing...
it’s from jeron.
recently there was a sudden increase in monster activity at airn house territory.
recently there was a sudden increase in monster activity at airn house territory.
in order to find out why this is happening,
he went off on his own...
...to investigate where they were appearing.
but after that,
he never returned home.
you want me to look over the manor while you’re away?
does that mean...
are you planning to go back to airelle by yourself, my lady?
well...
jeron asked for my help specifically.
and I don’t have anyone else to take along anyway.
if lord abel really did disappear, something must’ve happened.

hangle: 게다가 현재 헤일론의 무력으로 애를 먹을 정도라면 더욱이요.
first_translate: moreover, if even all the forces of airelle are having trouble dealing with these monsters, then things could get dangerous.
that's right. going alone would not be efficient.

hangle: 그렇지만 이런 일에 당장 데려갈 만한 인력이 있을까?
first_translate: but do we have enough people available to bring along immediately?

hangle: 급하게 준비하는 만큼 다수는 안 돼.
first_translate: since we’ll need to prepare quickly, we can’t send too many men either.
I’m so worried about him...
I'm coming as well.
siegren...?
but what about--

hangle: 아벨의 생사 여부도 알 수 없는 상황에서,
first_translate: lord abel might already be dead or injured somewhere.
do you think I’d let you head into such danger alone?
now I wonder which one of us needs calming down more...
then again,
of course sigg wouldn’t feel good about letting me go without protection.
of course sigg wouldn’t feel good about letting me go without protection.
on top of that,
what if something happens to me too?
what if something happens to me too?
is that what you’re thinking?
that way,
sigg will end up being left here all alone.
I know exactly what you’re worrying about.
let me think about it some more.
as long as abel’s daughter is under my care,
the decision-making power lies with me since the letter came addressed to me.
the decision-making power lies with me since the letter came addressed to me.
I am also anxious and concerned.
not just because of abel,
but because this may turn out to be quite risky business.
so,
this time around, I'll make the best choice possible.
even though I said those bold words to siegren,
even though I said those bold words to siegren,
I still haven’t decided how to handle everything yet...

hangle: 준비하는 동안 어디 알릴 수도 없으니…
first_translate: while preparing, I won’t be able to inform everyone...

hangle: 초대에 응했던 파티들도 빠질 수 없고….
first_translate: and I can’t skip any parties I accepted invitations to either...
I’m exhausted...

hangle: 그 술은 의외로 도수가 센 편이니 천천히 마셔요.
first_translate: be careful when drinking that wine. its alcohol content is higher than expected.
your face looks pale lately...
I guess it’s because I've been enjoying liquor recently...
this tastes nice...
taking care of party invitations today too
a high-end perfume that’s popular nowadays...
okay?
my heart feels lighter now...
livia is lovely once again tonight.
could house priscilla truly support the first princess?
could house priscella truly support the first princess?

hangle: 아주 만약에, 그녀와 적이 되면 몹시 아쉽겠지.
first_translate: if she ever becomes our enemy, it'd be very unfortunate.
I keep remembering what siegren told me about her highness...
hgh...
I better continue pondering about this matter.
can I help you?
oh dear,
pardon me for interrupting your conversation, ladies.
if you realize you’re being rude, perhaps you should leave,
count bill curtis.
where have I seen him before? he seems familiar somehow...
I recognize his name too...

hangle: 죄송하지만 함께 계신 분께 볼일이 있어서요.
first_translate: forgive me, but I actually wanted to speak with the person beside you.

hangle: 처음 뵙는 것 같은데, 무슨 일이시죠?
first_translate: nice meeting you. what brings you here?
it’s an honor to meet you, lady fiona halyeon.
please call me by my first name.
why does he seem like bad news...?

hangle: 리비아도 이 남자를 별로 좋아하는 것 같지 않고.
first_translate: livy doesn’t appear to like him much either.
I doubt anything will happen.
how may I assist you?
I sent you a letter...
did you receive it?
ah...
I remember now.
with everything that happened with abel, I forgot about it completely.
I received it recently.
lady fiona,
I have always had feelings for you.
I have always had feelings for you.
could you spare me...
...a moment of your precious time?
when did he start taking interest in me?
it isn’t wise for a noblewoman to spend time alone...

hangle: 그러나 자신에게 호감을 가진 남자와 단둘이 있는 건
first_translate: ...with someone she barely knows, especially if he claims to have romantic feelings toward her.
...with someone she barely knows, especially if he claims to have romantic feelings toward her.
of course,
it shouldn’t pose a problem for me personally.
alright.
if necessary, I’ll roast him alive.
